body: Story: Heroine, "Nozora Kido" is the only daughter of Yakuza head boss Kido-Kumichou. Since childhood she has been taken care of by "Tatsumi" her dad's right-hand man. After her father dies from conflict, Tatsumi takes Nozora out of the Kido mansion and begins their life in what is called the 6 tatami room apartment.
This is so sweet, I need to find someone to translate this so i can cum
